If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ð to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#29739](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29739) (depends: swap some cctools tools for LLVM tools by fanquake)
* [#29450](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29450) (build: replace custom `MAC_OSX` macro with standard `__APPLE__` for consistent macOS detection by paplorinc)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Added a commit to decrease the scope of using `-Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names`.

Apparently, CMake expects to find the `install_name_tool` when cross-compiling for macOS.

From https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/actions/runs/8885213906/job/24396062348:
```
 -- The C compiler identification is Clang 17.0.6
CMake Error at /usr/share/cmake-3.25/Modules/CMakeFindBinUtils.cmake:233 (message):
  Could not find install_name_tool, please check your installation.
```
Ported to the CMake-based build system in https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/pull/180.
